ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two: For The World Entire
ComicInfo.Summary:
Things get under way as Earth gets one step closer in discovering their destiny in the coming war.
Extraterrestrial contact has been made with Earth! The ultimatum has been given: join their struggle or be destroyed! Earth’s initial resistance resulted in the horrible events of last issue. If we continue to refuse, we will suffer even more. If we acquiesce, we’ll be thrown into a horrible war. Damned either way…
-Salvation Lies in Unity-
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-03 08:10:52. [CVDB115379]
ComicInfo.Characters: Audrey Martin, Gabriel Contreras, Hannibal, Kris Nelson, Lucia Contreras, Preston Walker, Sadiq Al-Asmari, Sruelik Mendelsohn
